entry.def: Membership of an organization is the state of being a member of it.

example.ex: The country has also been granted membership of the World Trade Organisation...
example.tran: 这个国家也被准予加入世界贸易组织。

example.ex: He sent me a membership form...
example.tran: 他寄给我一份入会登记表。

entry.tran: 全体会员(或成员);全体会员(或成员)人数
entry.def: The membership of an organization is the people who belong to it, or the number of people who belong to it.

example.ex: The European Builders Confederation has a membership of over 350,000 building companies.
example.tran: 欧洲建筑商联合会拥有逾35万家建筑公司会员。

means.word_mean: 1. the body of members of an organization or group;

sentences.sentence: "they found dissension in their own ranks"
"he joined the ranks of the unemployed"

means.word_mean: 2. the state of being a member

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词,表示"某种技能"; 2. 表名词,表示"某种关系,状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: airman飞行员,空军+ship某种技能→n.飞行术,导航技术
horseman养马的人,骑师,马兵+ship某种技能→n.马术

stems_affixes.value_cn: 推销术,说服力,销售,推销
stems_affixes.word_buile: salsman推销员+ship某种技能→n.推销术,说服力,销售,推销
champion冠军+ship某种关系,状态→n.锦标赛;冠军赛

stems_affixes.value_cn: 市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
stems_affixes.word_buile: citizen公民+ship某种关系,状态→n.市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
dictator专政者+ship某种关系,状态→n.独裁[权];专政
friend朋友+ship某种关系,状态→n.友谊,友好
hard艰难的+ship某种关系,状态→n.艰难,困苦
member成员+ship某种关系,状态→n.会员资格,成员资格
partner合作者+ship某种关系,状态→n.合伙企业
relation关系,联系+ship某种关系,状态→n.关系,联系

Sentence.sentence: A three-month membership costs 150 dollars, and that includes use of the wait-room, sauna and pool.
The man is going to renew his membership in a fitness center

sentences.en: The society has a large membership.
Our membership may refuse to discuss the matter.
sentences.cn: 我们全体成员可能拒绝讨论这件事。

means.word_mean: 会员身份, 会员资格

sentences.en: I must renew my membership of the sailing club.
sentences.cn: 我必须延续我的航海俱乐部会员的资格。
